alert.note: Alert for Faribault (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:53AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Faribault County through 830 AM CDT... At 753 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Winnebago, or 17 miles northeast of Fairmont, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Delavan around 800 AM CDT. Easton around 810 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Wells and Bricelyn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 113 and 142. U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 3 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
